name: Drone Crates
description:
Armed with a crowbar in a mess of floating metal islands, break open boxes and try to survive in this sandbox fighting simulation.

To play, use WASD and Space to move, Left-click to use the crowbar.

Enemy drones are red and shoot deadly missiles at you.

Attack drones are green and are the good guys. They fire missiles at the enemy drones.

Shield drones are blue and may seem useless, but they are immune to missiles, so you can use them as a shield
